alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Leflore (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 21 at 10:31AM CDT until March 26 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Jackson MS has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Mississippi... Yalobusha At Whaley affecting Leflore and Carroll Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY MORNING TO SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Yalobusha At Whaley. * WHEN...From Wednesday morning to Saturday evening. * IMPACTS...At 21.0 feet, Lowland flooding is occurring near the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM CDT Monday the stage was 20.5 feet. - Forecast...The river fall for the next 24 hours. With heavy rainfall tomorrow, the river is expected to rise above flood stage Wednesday morning to a crest of 22.0 feet on Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. - && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu Yalobusha Whaley 21.0 20.5 Mon 9 am CDT 20.1 21.3 21.9 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 48 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued this evening at 9 PM CDT.
